mapper.insert: replace into user_system_notification(notification_id, recipient_user_id, message, creation_time, sender, is_read) values (#{id}, #{recipientUserId}, #{message}, #{creationTime}, #{sender}, #{isRead})

insert into reply_notification(id, message, creation_time, sender, recipient_user_id, comment_id, bookmark_id, reply_to_comment_id, is_read) values (#{id}, #{message}, #{creationTime}, #{sender}, #{recipientUserId}, #{commentId}, #{bookmarkId}, #{replyToCommentId}, #{isRead})
insert into system_notification(id, message, creation_time, sender) values (#{id}, #{message}, #{creationTime}, #{sender})
mapper.select:
select 'REPLY_NOTIFICATION' as notificationType, rn.id,
c.comment as message, rn.creation_time,
c.username as sender, rn.recipient_user_id, rn.comment_id, rn.bookmark_id, rn.reply_to_comment_id, false as isRead,
if(b.is_public = 0 and lower(b.user_name) != lower(b.user_name), 'UNAUTHORIZED', 'ACCESSIBLE') as accessStatus
order by rn.id
desc
limit #{loadCount}
mapper.sql:
from reply_notification rn inner join user u
on rn.recipient_user_id = #{recipientUserId} and u.id = rn.recipient_user_id left join bookmark b on rn.is_read = 0 and rn.bookmark_id = b.id
and b.is_deleted = 0 left join comment c on rn.comment_id = c.id
and c.is_deleted = 0
and c.comment is not null and c.comment != '' where
rn.is_read = 0
and b.id is not null
and c.id is not null
mapper.select:
select 'SYSTEM_NOTIFICATION' as notificationType, 0 as isRead, s.id, s.message, s.creation_time, s.sender, #{recipientUserId} as recipientUserId
order by s.id
desc
limit #{loadCount}
mapper.sql:
from system_notification s where s.id not in (
select u.notification_id from user_system_notification u where u.recipient_user_id = #{recipientUserId} and u.is_read = 1 )
